mapper.select: SELECT ca.cart_id, ca.update_time, pr.product_name, us.wx_open_id, info.authorizer_id, info.authorizer_app_id, info.service_type_info, ms.wx_template_id FROM weiit_user_cart ca , weiit_product pr , weiit_user us , weiit_weixin_public_info info , weiit_weixin_public_template_msg ms , weiit_weixin_public_template_type tt where ca.product_id = pr.product_id and ca.user_id = us.user_id and ca.shop_id = info.shop_id and us.open_id_type = info.service_type_info and info.authorizer_id = ms.authorizer_id and ms.template_type_id = tt.template_type_id and ms.state = 1 and tt.business_type = #{business_type} and ca.update_time < #{end_time}
